title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 843/95 of 18 April 1995 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2210/93 on the communication of information for the purposes of the common organization of the market in fishery and aquaculture products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 843/95 of 18 April 1995 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2210/93 on the communication of information for the purposes of the common organization of the market in fishery and aquaculture products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to this Regulation hereby replaces Annex I to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2210/93 (3).

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1995.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 350, 31. 12. 1994, p. 15.
(3) OJ No L 197, 6. 8. 1993, p. 8.
